Windlord/Nightlight::

Windlord flew around looking for his friend While
Nightlight was running around where Aerotaur was
(without her know it) calling him "Aerotaur,
Aerotaur... Where're you??"


--- Rudra656@... wrote:
> ::Aerotaur::
>     He runs aimlessly through the underbrush so that
> any flyer would have 
> trouble keeping up with him.  He zigged and zagged
> between trees, avoiding 
> every clearing.
>
